title: Monthly consumer Price Index ( CPI ) in India July 2019

gold: The Consumer Price Index across India was 142.9 as of June 2019.
This means that the price index has increased by about 42.9 percent since the year 2012.
The index for urban and rural regions differed by about 1.5 percent in the stated time period .
